frontmatter.title: [macOS] Install m1 homebrew
frontmatter.description: Unlike Intel Macs, Macs with m1 or higher require a slightly additional homebrew installation process. Today we will learn how to install homebrew on an m1 Mac.

frontmatter.author: Classic95
